join_discord_desc: Follow HackQuest Discord to find your dream team!

claim.description: Complete tasks to earn official certificate from {{name}} ecosystem. After you earn 100 points from level 1, you will get a starter certificate and level up. Get 500 points to become an expert {{name}} developer.

mint.title: Congratulations! You’re a {{title}}
mint.mintSuccessTitle: Congratulations! You have obtained the {{title}} certificate
mint.description: You’ve reached a significant milestone in your Web3 learning! Mint your certificate as a testament to your expertise.
